event.name: FileOpenError
event.comment: The ComLogger encountered an error opening a file

arg.name: errornum
arg.comment: The error number returned from open file

event.name: FileWriteError
event.format_string: Error %d while writing %d of %d bytes to %s
event.comment: The ComLogger encountered an error writing to a file

arg.name: errornum
arg.comment: The error number returned from write file

arg.name: bytesWritten
arg.comment: The number of bytes successfully written to file

arg.name: bytesToWrite
arg.comment: The number of bytes attempted to write to file

event.name: FileValidationError
event.format_string: The ComLogger failed to create a validation file %s for %s with error %d.
event.comment: The ComLogger encountered an error writing the validation file

event.name: FileClosed
event.comment: The ComLogger successfully closed a file on command.
